General.Name: Levinstein Prop
General.Description: Levinstein Properties Ltd initiates, builds, markets, and rents real estate properties in Israel. Its properties include towers for offices, offices, parking, storage, office buildings, shopping centers, malls, industrial parks,etc. The company was incorporated in 1986 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel. Levinstein Properties Ltd is a subsidiary of Meshulam Levinstein Contracting & Engineering Ltd.
General.Address: Derech Menachem Begin 23, Tel Aviv, Israel
